text:
After a quick review, it looks like fixing this would require quite a few 
changes, so I suggest postponing it to 4.1.

Internally, the default servlet and the dir context implementations use longs, 
but unfortunately, the response implementation uses longs everywhere.
creator: remm@apache.org

text: The new HTTP/1.1 connector (although not yet integrated with Tomcat 4) fixes this.
creator: remm@apache.org
